title: Judge blocks Trump lawyer's 'inappropriate' witness request: report

content.background: This article discusses the attempt by Donald Trump's lawyer to request certain witnesses in a fraud trial. It also includes information about conversations with former vice president Mike Pence and U.S. Senator Grassley regarding the certification of the 2020 election results.
content.summary: The central theme of this article is the attempt by Donald Trump's lawyer to request witnesses in a fraud trial. It also highlights conversations involving Mike Pence and U.S. Senator Grassley regarding the certification of the 2020 election results.
